name: contrast-widget
description: Bookmarklet to analyse the contrast of test elements in a document

scripts.build:js: mkdir -p build && rollup -c && babel --presets es2015 ./build/contrast-widget-bundle.es2015.js | uglifyjs -m -r Chartist --screw-ie8 > ./build/contrast-widget-bundle.min.js && wc -c ./build/contrast-widget-bundle.min.js
scripts.watch: ./parallel.sh "nodemon --watch ./lib -e js --exec npm run build:js" "nodemon --watch ./client -e html --exec npm run build:html"
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run build:other && npm run build:json

author: Ada Rose Edwards <ada@ada.is>
